useExistingEmailInfo: Use the email you gave when you became a member to see your existing membership status.
noNameText1: Really great that you want to join Uppsala Makerspace!
noNameText2: Before we proceed we need som more information about you.
noMembershiptext1: We couldn't find an active membership linked to your email.
noMembershiptext2: If you wish to activate a membership, it's easy to do right here in the app. Just choose the membership you're interested in and complete the payment, you'll get instant access to the space.
expiredMembershipText2: You can easily renew your membership directly here in the app.
memberBasetext: With our basic membership, you're welcome to use our makerspace during our open evenings and Saturday workshops.
memberDiscountedBaseText: If you are a student, pensioner or unemployed you can get access to the Makerspace during our open evenings and Saturday workshops at a reduced price.
memberLabText: With a Lab Membership, you get 24/7 access to the Makerspace. You'll also get a personal storage box, so you don't have to carry your things back and forth.
memberDiscountedLabText: If you are a student, pensioner or unemployed you can get 24/7 access to the Makerspace at a reduced price.
memberQuarterlyLabText: With a quarterly lab membership, you get 24/7 access to the Makerspace for three months. This requires membership.
memberFamilyBaseText: With a family membership, up to four people registered at the same address get access to the Makerspace during our open evenings and Saturday workshops.
memberFamilyLabText: With a Family Lab Membership, up to four people registered at the same address get 24/7 access to the Makerspace.
IAgree: I have read and promise to follow the membership agreement.
AgreementInfo: All of our members must read and promise to follow our Membership Agreement.
CloseToAgree: You have now read the entire Agreement
AlertEndDate: Psst - your lab membership needs to be renewed within
LoggedInAsMember: You are logged in as a member.
Name: Name
WriteSlack: You can also write to us on Slack:
PressSlack: Click here to go to our Slack channel.
noAvailableDoors: No available doors. Make sure you have an active lab membership.
FamilyMember: You are part of a family membership
familyPayerText: You are part of a family. The membership is paid by:
FillInEmail: Fill in your email in order to reset your password
SomethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again.
emailNotVerifiedText1: Before you can continue, you need to verify your email address.
emailNotVerifiedText2: Check your inbox for a verification email and click the link to confirm your email.
MembershipRegistered: Your membership is now registered. If you purchased a lab membership, your keys will be activated immediately, and you will have access to our premises. Have fun and take good care of our facilities!
familyInviteText: You have been invited to join a family. Would you like to accept or decline?
Membershipstext1: At Uppsala Makerspace, we believe creativity should be accessible to everyone, regardless of financial circumstances. That is why we aim to keep membership fees as low as possible. In return, we all need to contribute to the work required to keep our community thriving
contactBoardDescription: For questions about membership, the organization, or other official matters, you can reach the board via:
checkBeforeContact: But before you contact the board we encourage you to check our
boardInformationDescription: The board communicates information to members in four ways:
infoNewsletter: Newsletter - sent out roughly once per month
infoSlackGeneral: Slack channel - for announcements and updates
infoCalendar: Calendar updates - for events and activities
infoBlogpost: Blog posts - for bigger events and news
memberCommunicationDescription: Most of the communication among members takes place on Slack. The most active channels are:
channelLokalenDescription: Discussions about the space, equipment, and what's happening at the makerspace
moreChannelsDescription: There are also many topic-specific channels for various interests and workshops.
storageRequiresLab: You need an active lab membership to have a storage box.
noBoxAssigned: You don't have a storage box yet.
queueForBoxInfo: Join the queue to get a storage box when one becomes available.
inQueueForBox: You are in the queue for a storage box.
boxPreferenceInfo: Let us know if you have a preference for where your box should be located.
requestBoxChangeInfo: If you want to change your box location, select your preference below.
storageNoBoxNeeded: I no longer need a box
